data.description: Parse iCalendar files into a data structure
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
This module builds on Text::vFile::asData, but adds calendar
    specific parsing and (ical) event expansion.

    Net::ICal seems to be DOA (no uploads since Aug 2001), is extremely
    heavy and, at least in my environment, fails ~20% of its tests
